A great shirt to have on hand for any party, rave or concert! I've brought it out on many occasions where I wanted to be festive but not uncomfortable and have gotten many compliments on it. You may match some other ravers in your crowd due to the shirts popularity.

I bought this for a festival. I got lots of compliments and it was super comfy. It does have more of a box-y type cut so it the waist portion was pretty wide on me. I tucked it in the front just for some shape. It was light weight and perfect for the florida heat. It also glows so well under black light
It fit well. It was exactly what I expected and more. I love that it glowed under the concert lights!  Great value!
This is not a crop top as image suggests and does not look like the picture. Also I ordered an xs and was sent a small
It's got bright colors, so it gets points for that, I guess, but it isn't reflective AT ALL and also tbh it smells like death.

Super cute and comfy cropped top shirt. Material is a little thicker than t-shirt material and the sleeves are long so it’ll still be wearable once the weather starts to cool down. I love that the shirt is boxy and wide. I’m 5’7 215lbs and got an XL. Might get other colors!

I like this top. It is a little boxy. It glows nicely.
was true to size, is super comfortable and fabric was not cheap feeling at all!

Really short like too short ..shorter than q crop top if that makes any sense. Colors were not really vibrant. Looked very cheap and will definitely just wear this to bed
Good material nice colors, very comfortable unfortunately runs a little bit bigger than I expected so I returned it
Love the material nice and thick the fit is also nice price is good I just love this top

I bought this for my niece, and we went up a size to try and get a little more length because she is fairly  chesty.  It just got wider  but not any longer.  The shirt  just kinda tents and nearly exposes the bottom  of her breast.  It is also more of a sweat shirt material.  If your medium to smaller up top this shirt would work well  but be cautious if your bigger up top. You might be putting on a show.

评论概述: It's pretty but the size isn't even close.
评论详情: If this was the correct size they claim it to be, this would be a 5-star review. But here we are....again....disappointed and sad, because what should have been an extra large, and says it's an extra large, so that it could be roomy and off the shoulder for my daughter's 80s neon themed dance, appears to be a large-small or a small-medium. It sure isn't big enough to fit my daughter, and she's NOT a big kid.

I already have this top in the multi. It is amazing. Great slouch in the shoulders and wide bottom. Bought the black multi (paint splash pattern) and didn’t realize that that entire style was different. More fitted shoulders and elastic bottom on the shirt. Totally different! I will be returning it. Please pay attention to the details. The styles vary based on pattern.

This product is super cute, and has a nice, loose fit. I am 5’8” and 170 lbs, and I bought a Large size. It is loose, drapey (in a flattering way), and the crop length of the top shows just enough mid-waist to be comfortable and cute. The material is soft, and the patterning is gorgeous. Highly recommend this piece!
Nice shirt material kinda thin but overall good quality matches perfect with my daughter skirt
Fit well

评论详情: Ok first remember the picture of this item, now remember the beautiful lady showing it off..... well the top is just that great!  Now I have to say I am 65 and short.... now stop laughing. I needed something flashy to wear to my granddaughters 8th bday "glow" party. I put a long sleave black shirt under it and black jeans and boots. The shirt over top and it was a hit.  For a young person buying to wear to a concert or party, pls do. It really is fabulous.
I have a long torso, and this is a little shorter than most of my crop tops. It's comfy though and not see through.

Love,love,love, this shirt the colors are amazing, do show in UV lights, and a very cute style

I love the design on it! Very beautiful crop shirt

The description is deceptive in saying it's reflective & that's the only reason I took a star off. 'Vibrant' is a far better buzz word. That being said, I'm obsessed with this shirt! The fabric is soft, smooth, & stretchy (not TOO stretchy.) The colors are very bright & highly UV reactive. I think the length of the Medium size is flattering on my short, curvy body. (153lbs, 5'3") You definitely don't want to go without a bra or some pasties! My left boob (the one playing peak-a-boo) is a big C & my right one is a little D. My underboob measurement is exactly 34in. (Idk my bra size anymore because I gave up & only wear sports bras now) Both girls don't peek out unless I put my arms all the way up, but the right one requires less encouragement to make an appearance.
I love this shirt! Bought it for a party but it’s great for the gym and really any other function. So comfy and great colors and fit!
Everyone loved this shirt. It's so fun and a great cropped length
2 thumbs up!  Glows great in dark!

This shirt is super fun, definitely a very baggy crop top. Material is comfy, looks like cotton but is polyester. The colors are super bright which is fun! I’m 5’1” ~110 lbs and the small is very baggy, and I’m pretty busty. Got the small as Amazon recommended it would be my size, but it’s way too large. Going to return for an x-small.
It only covered my breasts half way. I am not heavily busted. Didn't fit any where close to how it is pictured.
This shirt is so fun and breathable it’s fantastic! Got so many compliments while at clubs wearing it and it makes me feel more confident in the body I’m in!
Some of the promo images are a lil deceptive. This isn't reflective material but rather the illusion of reflective material. Even with that, I still absolutely loved the top.

评论详情: Great slouch fit in shoulders, colors are vibrant and shocking. I get a lot of compliments when I wear it to shows and events. The only weird thing is just how large the torso opening is.

Love this top. I bought a size bigger, and it is a little bit big, so chose accurate to your usual size. But love it, soft fabric, and the design has a nice marbled effect with the black running throughout the pattern. There is no shiny, holographic effect to the shirt, it is just silky but very versatile to go with many colored pants/skirts/shorts. I wear a black tank top underneath because it is a crop top that comes just above the pants line. Buy this today, great for a cruise, or going out at night, or hanging out at the beach with some shorts.
Cheap quality. Not reflective. Just a print on a shirt made poorly with poor materials.  Don't waste your time or money. I got this for a concert and couldn't even wear it.
Nothing like the picture

As for the colors on this top, they’re veryyyy vibrant and beautiful, I was expecting a little more purples and blues but it’s no biggie. The design and fabric is beautiful and the material feels really nice to touch. I was expecting the sleeves to be a bit more baggy, but the size of this shirt is smaller than I normally would buy. I was impressed to see it still fit me just not as baggy as it’s meant to be of course. I normally wear a size 2x, but can comfortably were this XL as a normal crop top. The short sleeves are comfortably long enough and this would be the right amount of baggy on someone who normally wears an XL.
